channel.title: bms.exe not launching
channel.description: 1. [sup][/sup]Recently my Black Mesa stopped launching but it worked at first time when I bought it.I tried to fox it installing software,verifying game cache,usinvg launch parameters.But it still didn't worked.Then I replaced bms.exe with hl2.exe from Half Life 2 and everything works fine now.Please fix game launcher in next update some people also have this problem.

item.title: bms.exe not launching
item.dc:creator: Hds46
item.description:
LordDz:

Have you subscribed to any mods?

Yes but I had them before this issue.
Similar problem was with Prototype in steam but I fixed it.

Read full topic
